lines.text: The Go Wizard used the candle to set fire to...
...the Spontaneously Teleporting Kindling Heap That Appears At Two Thirty-Five AM.
The magical heap of kindling that spontaneously teleports to a random location in the middle of the night?
You don't know! Ancient wizards made all kinds of wacky magical items!
Not in a million years, no, but I'll try to goof around more productively.
